title: Vision. [No. 26]
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Social life and customs
description: Cinemagazine: School of the Arts; Los Angeles Freeway; fish farming with the Lummis - an Indian tgribe has mastered the science of fish-farming; frostbiting - people who sail all year round braving winter winds and temperatures; homesteading - deserted town houses are granted to citizens willing to make them liveable again; head in the stars - Ken Kulak, 12 years old, runs a planetarium and studies computer sciences and astronomy; Theater of the Deaf - a repertory company tours the world performing for deaf and non-deaf people alike.
